channel.title: 718 Question
channel.description:
How would I change the item bonuses on a 718?
There is a folder called "bonuses" full of notepads... me, being the idiot that I am, edited it, compiled, and nothing changed
if anyone knows how to change the item bonuses, I would greatly appreciate it.
